def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState form = widget.ProviderWidget entity = form.Entity entAux = widget.Entity
if (entity == None) : return
if entity["TIPOCONCILIACAO"].GetInt32() != 1 and entity["TIPOCONCILIACAO"].GetInt32() != 3: widget.Hidden = True
